A test_result stores errors (from thrown exceptions) and failures (from assertions) from a test run.

{{macros.template_parameters(["Allocator", "An allocator that is used to acquire/release memory and to construct/destroy the elements in that memory."])}}
{{macros.member_types( ["allocator_type", "typename std::allocator_traits<Allocator>::template rebind_alloc<std::exception>"] )}}
